version_description: - Performance improved.

- Cool new notification center widget.
- You can add transactions from new widget.

- Cool & Awesome new notification center widget.
- You can quickly add transactions from new widget.

- Repaired decimal separator for widget.
- Improve widget for iOS 9.

Next version will be a big update for iOS 11!
- Improve app performance on iOS 11
- We now support to link more banks with Money Lover

Black Friday 2017: 50% OFF for Premium Plan
--
Big update for iOS 11, new skin color.
Improvements and bug fixes.

We regularly update to bring your the best expense tracker and money management app. Update the latest version to assure your budgets are all set and every your expenses are tracked perfectly! Having trouble? Please, drop an email to contact@moneylover.me
Where does all the money go by the end of each month? Put a expense tracker app on your smartphone, and you'll no longer need to wonder. Money Lover is perfect for you.

We regularly update to bring your the best expense tracker and money management app. Update the latest version to assure your budgets are all set and every your expenses are tracked perfectly! Having trouble? Please, drop an email to contact@moneylover.me

* NEW FEATURE
Money Lover now has CREDIT WALLET for you to keep track of your credit card transactions. With CREDIT WALLET, you can:
- Record, keep track and organize Credit card transactions.
- Receive alerts when your expenses exceed your Credi

In this version, we have upgraded our sync system. We are pleased to report that we have successfully increased login sync speed and reduced pending time. Our test with a sample of over 100 wallets experienced sync speed that is 1/10 t
